mapper.insert: insert into menu (cafeName, detailName, menuName, price, path) values (#{cafeName}, #{detailName}, #{menuName}, #{price}, "default")
mapper.delete: delete from menu where detailName=#{detailName} and menuName=#{menuName} and cafeName=#{cafeName}
mapper.update: update menu set price=#{price} where detailName=#{detailName} and menuName=#{menuName} and cafeName=#{cafeName}
mapper.select: select * from menu order by likeNum
select * from menu order by point
